title: Sage card
data:
{{Obsolete}} The Sage card temporarily diverts incoming XP towards a skill. The closer a skill is to level 20, the more likely it is to be selected, though every skill is eligible. Gives a [[manual]]-like bonus at power 1 and 2. Multiple Sage effects stack, even if they affect the same skill, so if the player has a +10% Sage for 1000 xp and a +24% Sage for 2000 xp, the combined Sages will steal 3000 xp total, putting 3580 xp into that skill. ==History== The Sage card could be found in the following [[Decks|decks]] before it was removed in [[0.15]]. {| class="prettytable" ![[0.11]] ![[0.12]] ![[0.13]] ![[0.14]] |---- !style="text-align:left;vertical-align:top;font-weight:normal"| [[Deck of changes|Changes]]
